bibl.title: The Hidden / Revealed Saying in the Greek and Coptic Versions of Gos.Thom. 5 & 6.
bibl.note: P. Oxy. IV, 654 (= van Haelst 593) was derived from a text of the Gospel of Thomas (at least in the case of the sayings in Thomas 5 and 6), be it Greek or Coptic, that is reflected in the extant Coptic recension of the gospel.
bibl.seg: JOHNSON Steven R., The Hidden / Revealed Saying in the Greek and Coptic Versions of Gos.Thom. 5 & 6.
